Text:
setup doesn't completes, it asks for the following file and that is missing:
readme_us.html

plz rectify the problem.

the following error comes just before completion of setup:
Please insert disk 1 that contains the file readme_us.html.

plz help

Hi artimb

Sorry, But I don't know about you problem. Because I was successfully installed it and played it without problems.

artimb, there is a file named readme_en.html in the folder.
Copy and paste that file 5 times, and change the name of all those copies into:

readme_de.html
readme_es.html
readme_fr.html
readme_it.html
readme_us.html

It should finish installing now, and yes, you can alt-tab to do this.
When I try to play the game it says: Please insert original CD/DVD.    someone help please
Whenever I try to play the game it says: Insert original CD/DVD.  What do I do???
